alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Montgomery; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 3:09PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Montgomery, southwestern San Jacinto and north central Harris Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 309 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chateau Woods, or near The Woodlands, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conroe, Willis, The Woodlands, Spring, Oak Ridge North, Panorama Village, Shenandoah, Cut And Shoot, Woodloch, The Woodlands Pavillion, Chateau Woods, Lake Conroe Dam and Porter Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
